description: Retrieves the status of your account's Amazon Web Services service access, and validates the service linked role required to access the multi-account search feature. Only the management account can invoke this API call.

nested_items.name: OrgConfiguration
nested_items.description: Details about the organization, and whether configuration is ENABLED or DISABLED.

nested_items.name: AWSServiceAccessStatus
nested_items.description: This value displays whether your Amazon Web Services service access is ENABLED or DISABLED.

nested_items.name: ServiceLinkedRole
nested_items.description: This value shows whether or not you have a valid a service-linked role required to start the multi-account search feature.
